{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Meat | class = Meat | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: Meat
 →{{Class|Junk}}
A decorative gib actor spawned by [[A_TossGib]] if called on a bleeding actor. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Meat native { +{{flag|NOCLIP}} States { Spawn: MEAT A 700 Stop MEAT B 700 Stop MEAT C 700 Stop MEAT D 700 Stop MEAT E 700 Stop MEAT F 700 Stop MEAT G 700 Stop MEAT H 700 Stop MEAT I 700 Stop MEAT J 700 Stop MEAT K 700 Stop MEAT L 700 Stop MEAT M 700 Stop MEAT N 700 Stop MEAT O 700 Stop MEAT P 700 Stop MEAT Q 700 Stop MEAT R 700 Stop MEAT S 700 Stop MEAT T 700 Stop } }
